TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer has spread into connective tissue of the cervix, but has not spread outside the uterus.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage II uterine sarcoma"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "sarcoma uterino en estadio II"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El cáncer se ha diseminado hacia el tejido conjuntivo del cuello uterino, pero no se ha diseminado fuera del utero.
